Lab.Description: In this lab, you will improve the Contoso Cookbook views by handling orientation, snapping, and adding semantic zoom to easily navigate through our recipe data.
Lab.Title: Optimizing your views: Orientation, snapping and semantic zoom

Property.Name: LongDescription
Property.Value: In this lab, you will improve the Contoso Cookbook views by handling orientation, snapping, and adding semantic zoom to easily navigate through our recipe data.
